turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about 2012–13 AWHL season.
turn.2: 2012–13 AWHL season The 2012–13 AWHL season was the second season of the American West Hockey League.
turn.4: The regular season schedule ran from September 28, 2012, to March 2, 2013.
turn.5: What teams were in the AWHL?
turn.6: The Yellowstone Quake joined the AWHL from the Northern Pacific Hockey League (NorPac) as the league's seventh member.
turn.7: What teams did they play against?
turn.8: The Glacier Nationals, a team in the Northern Pacific Hockey League, played 20 games (10 home, 10 away) against AWHL teams in order to alleviate the travel time Glacier had to make to play other teams in their league.
turn.9: Why did they have to travel to play against other teams in their league?
turn.10: Glacier was the farthest east of all of the NorPac teams at the time.
turn.11: Who did they play in the championship?
turn.12: The Helena Bighorns swept the Missoula Maulers in three games to advance to the finals.
